choices: Officer Crystal sneaks up on you
Mess with the fairies
Mess with a nearby village of humans
Steal something
Prank officer Crystal
1.content: You wake up in your cozy hideaway, a small plain looking tree at the edge of the fairy town known as Pixie Hollow. After your morning routine you peek out of a small hole and once the coast is clear you fly out into the forest. You keep to the canopy and spy on the fairies down below as they go about doing their tasks and maintaining the health of the forest. "What a boring life" you whisper under your breath as you wonder what kind of adventure and mischief you wish to create for yourself.
1.title: Pixie Hollow

choices: Something is wrong with the forest
She is going to tail you all day
She suspects you of a previous crime
She wants to use you to train the new policewomen
A princess has demanded a personal fairy (you)
11.content:
"There you are!!" You hear officer Crystal yell from right behind you nearly giving you a heart attack as you fall back onto a branch. You catch your breath and stammer "Jeez can you be any louder? The day just started I haven't done anything.. " She rolls her eyes and stands over you.

She is a gorgeous fairy with a fit and curvy body. She has dark brown hair cut to her shoulders with brown sparkly eyes. She is wearing a tight blue uniform that hugs her form tightly, especially her big butt and strong thighs which you know all to well can crush a fairies head in seconds. You rub your head just thinking about your last arrest

"You done starting?" she says with a smirk. "Listen this is whats going on..."
11.title: Loud Call of the Law

choices: Yes (You immediately flee)
Yes (play dumb)
No, for once you are actually innocent
111.content:
"Something has slowly been eating away at the forest this past week! Fairies have reported dark strands coming from the ocean and invading into our lands starting at North Beach. I have a strong feeling that YOU might be responsible for this" She says as she glares at you and reaches down to help you up.

Could you be responsible for this? You honestly have to stop and think as you take her hand and stand up. Well there was a lot of things you stole last week... and powerful magic beings possibly angered... could it be your fault?
111.title: Forest in Trouble

choices: A young Polynesian woman
A Native american woman
A Princess
1111.content:
You have a sinking feeling you know exactly what is causing this... and it is definitely your fault. You look straight into Crystal's glaring eyes open your mouth to speak but instead immediately take off flying like a madman.

"Gods Damn it Alf!!!" She yells as she immediately takes flight after you. Meanwhile you are zooming through the trees heading straight for North Beach. You hope to find a certain gem you buried before Crystal can catch up to you. You manage to reach the dunes of the beach and notice a boat approaching shore with a human woman on board!

BAM!! You are knocked out of the air with a powerful kick from behind as Crystal has caught up to you and launched you into the sand completely unaware of the human trespasser approaching. You are laying on your back and from the corner of your eye you see boat has reached the sand and the young woman has stepped onto the beach when Crystal straddles you and pins your shoulders down with her hands.

"This has nothing to do with me" You lie to her face and try to tell her about the woman only to receive a solid punch in the face. "Yeah right why did you run then!?"

By now the woman is dangerously close and both you and Crystal feel the vibrations of her steps! You look and get a clear view of her!
1111.title: Fleeing the Scene

choices: You give in
You play dumb
11111.content:
Your eyes widen as the beautiful but gigantic (to you) Polynesian girl approaches seemingly looking for something as she scans the sand. Luckily for you Crystal is also shocked in surprise allowing you to roll her off you and giving her a powerful shove. You grin as you reach into your pocket and slap a small seed onto her back which pops into a sticky thread entangling her wings as she gets send rolling towards the approaching woman!

You've never actually seen Crystal get squashed. In fact you are always the one getting smashed and boy does it hurt like nothing else. You grin as she is about to finally know what it feels like as the massive tan foot descents down with a crash blocking her from view. You laugh hysterically rolling in the sand and holding your sides until the massive foot lifts off.

"What!?" You exclaim as you see Crystal was spared just under the arch of the foot mere centimeters away from being crushed. She sighs with relief while you failed to see the human change direction and find yourself cast in a massive shadow. You gulp and look up to see the bottom of her foot slam down on you painfully driving your tiny body into the sand beneath her powerful heel. You groan in pain as her entire body weight effortlessly flattens every bit of you beneath her. When her foot finally lifts up you remain stuck to it along with many specs of sand only to get trampled again and again with each step.

"Where is the heart of Tefiti? It must be here" the woman says as she desperately treks across the beach. Meanwhile Crystal is sitting in the sand cleaning her wings and laughing as she sees your flattened body get pounded again and again beneath the pretty girls heel. She finally sees you get left behind one of the girls footprints and zooms over to you.

"That's what you get you criminal scum. Now what is she going on about?" She says smiling down at you. Meanwhile you gasp in pain spitting out sand and twitching as your flattened body tries to heal. "Owww.." is all you manage to mutter. Crystal rolls her eyes and stomps on your crotch making you squeak in pain "I'll toss you right back under her if you don't start talking!"
11111.title: Good Luck Bad Luck

choices: You return the stone
You try to escape
111111.content:
"Okay okay!!" you mutter "I think she is looking for this green gem I stole.. It is supposed to give you powers but all it did was glow for me." Crystal is enraged "And you couldn't take it back!?" She grabs you by your flat neck and lifts you up "It's so Shiny though" you respond nervously.

"Ugh" You are under arrest she says as she flaps you in the air until you pop back to normal and cuffs your right wrist to her left with a magic vine. "Well WE are giving it back to her" She then flies up towards the girl towing you with the vine as she tries to get her attention. "Look you have the rock just give it to her I don't need to be around for th-"

You get cut off as two huge hands SLAP together squashing you between them with Crystal just barely out of harms way!

"Ewww thats a weird looking bug" the girl says as she examines your squashed body stuck to her palm. "huh bug people?" She says confused as she sees the tether on your arm attached to Crystal who is flying up to peel you off the hand and speak to her

"We are not bug people we are fairies!" Crystal says loudly and full of adrenaline from another near crush experience. She regains her composure as the girl realizes what she has done "Sorry about your friend there" She stares as your flat body as it hangs in the air.

"He... well he deserved it honestly" Crystal says with a smirk. "He knows what you are looking for cause he stole it!" she says as she unties the vine and lets you free fall onto the girls awaiting palms. She looks frustrated but says

"I am Moanna of Motonui! You will board my ship and return the heart of Tefiti!"

You finally pop back into shape and..
111111.title: Meeting Moana

choices: Moana breaks into song and dance
Crystal decides to help you out
1111111.content:
Terrified of what she might do to you your body instinctively nods and you stammer "Alright alright I'll bring you the stone!" You quickly fly down to the sand and towards and old coconut tree and in no time you start digging under it and pull out the glowing stone. Moana gently plucks it from you and holds it to her chest "Oh thanks goodness I finally found it, thank you kind Fairy" She says to Crystal.

"What about me?" you exclaim exhausted and sweaty from digging. She gently picks you up and says "Little thief you will board my boat and help me return the heart to the goddess Tefiti." You quickly fly off her hand "No look I gave you the rock! It's a dangerous world out there for a fairy but you can manage!"

Crystal flies up behind you "You know normally I can't just let fairies leave our lands with strangers but I think I can make an exception this time." She says as she bumps you hard with her hip sending you towards Moana.

"Great!" She says as she catches you and gently tosses you towards her boat. You land roughly on the wooden deck as you watch Crystal land on Moana's shoulder "I'm coming too I wouldn't miss this for the world" she says holding back a laugh.

"Screw this" You says as you zoom off the boat and over the shoreline! Crystal is ready to spring into action but Moana whispers "hold on" as the ocean seems to come alive! A wave leaps up and swallows you whole dragging you back towards the boat and spitting you roughly on the deck soaked to the bone.

"Wow I wish I had magic like that" Crystal exclaims as the two women laugh and approach the boat. With your wings heavy and wet you can't fly and have to sprint like crazy to just barely avoid getting stepped on again as Moana boards the boat.

"At least have her watch where she is going!" You yell up at Crystal who likely can't hear you. The girls keep chatting as Moana moves about setting everything up and setting off to sea. You are in a non stop panic sprint as you scamble about the boat nearly getting squashed underfoot not knowing how much more you can dodge this girl!
1111111.title: Coming Clean

choices: Reaching the island of Tefiti
Something interrupts the journey
More trouble on the boat
11111111.content:
Much to your horror and Crystal's amusement, Moana Breaks into song and dance! She sweeps her foot out as she dances accidentally kicking you out into the ocean! The water angrily spits you back at the ship. You smack right into the boom of the sail just as Moana pushes her butt against it to turn the boat!

You body gets squashed flat between her butt cheek and the wooden pole leaving you stuck to her skirt for a few moments but the constant shifting of her hips from the dancing jiggles you off her ass and down onto the floor. You land on your back staring up at the singing beauty powerless to move as her foot once again covers your vision and STOMPS down hard! You are annihilated much rougher than before. There is no sand to cushion her weight only unforgiving wood as she pounds and twists her feet on you all the while unaware of your situation. One of her stomps gets you stuck to her sole this time as she continues leaping and dancing around the boat all while navigating the open sea.

Finally she finishes her song and plops down on her butt stretching her legs out in front of her and panting lightly. Crystal flies up to her face clapping "That was great! Loved it such a nice performance! Just remember to uh be a little more careful.." She says as she flies over to Moana's foot and starts peeling your flattened body off her sole like a band-aid.

Moana winces seeing how badly she demolished you "Oh my gosh I am so sorry" but Crystal cheerily says "He forgives you and he will be fine" and then tosses you onto the floor like a used rag.

You lay in agony... you can't even remember the last time you've been crushed this bad if ever... you only hope things go smoothly from here.
11111111.title: How far you'll go

choices: Try to take the stone
Resist the urge
111111111.content:
"I promise I'll be more careful!" Moana exclaims to you worriedly. You try to respond to her but Crystal out of genuine curiosity starts asking about the different parts of the boat and how they work. Moana excitedly turns around on her knees to face her and starts to explain things.

You start to panic as Moana turns around hovering her big booty over your already beaten form! It rises up and lowers down several times as she excitedly points to different things. Then she adjust her legs to sit indian style dropping her heavy ass down on you with a loud PLOP as your body squishes even more beneath her ass cheek. She grinds her ass down on you to get comfy smearing you back and forth.

After what feels like forever she finally stands leaving you plastered to the floor as she rummages through her belongings for food. She shares some banana and coconut with Crystal as they chat and stare into the beautiful ocean unaware of what just happened to you..

Luckily they keep their distance you eventually heal from the horror you were just subjected to... you moan in pain as you limp towards the sail and start to fly awkwardly to gain height and cling to it for safety. That is when you see a mountain sized fire demon on a molten island!

In a panic you fly to Moana's shoulder and say "Do you not see that thing!? We need to turn away now!!!!" Moana shakes her head. "I know what to do..." Crystal stands beside you and says "This is your doing now deal with it!" she then grabs your shoulder tightly, slightly panicking herself. The ocean parts and Moana steps onto the sand as the Fire demon crawls towards her. She lifts up the glowing gem which seems to calm the demon down. But that green glow calls to you, down to your thief instincts.... how do you respond?
111111111.title: Turning a new Leaf?

choices: Back at Pixie Hollow (reserved)
Somewhere else?
Tefiti brings you back mid flight!!!
1111111111.content:
Deep down even you realize this is a bad idea but you simply can't resist the urge to steal the gem! You zoom full speed reaching out to snag it right from Moana's fingers but before you can even touch it you feel Crystal's hands grab your ankle in a death grip as she yells "You Idiot!!! Don't you learn!?" and she spins you around and around before letting you go launching you head first into the sand.

Meanwhile Moana gives the Gem to the demon who quickly absorbs it and returns to her true form. The goddess Tefiti, a green beautiful woman the size of an island! She is grateful to have her heart returned and gently scoops up Moana with Crystal now back on her shoulder. Tefiti Starts to walk towards her island with her champions in hand.

You finally pluck your head from the sand spitting out the salty grains when you notice a colossal green foot above you! You have never seen any living thing to big in your life and stare in awe and horror as Tefiti STEPS down on you utterly splattering you like gum beneath her heal. Her literal full island weight presses down on you for what seems like an eternity squashing you beyond belief. It finally lifts up with your poor body stuck to the bottom of her heel ready to get TRAMPLED again and again under mind blowing weight and pain. It somehow gets even worse as she steps onto the stone surface of her island no longer affording you what little help the sand may have given you. However after a few thunderous steps on the island you are left plastered on the ground just behind the goddess.

As you regain your vision from the blinding pain you realize her mountain sized ass cheeks are lowering down above you! An Earth shattering BOOM quakes the island as her ass crashes down on you like a meteor even causing tidal waves to bellow out into the water. It is indescribable how much pain such a tiny being like yourself can suffer beneath such a massive goddess. She shifts in her seat further annihilating you beneath her right ass cheek.

Meanwhile Tefiti, Moana and Crystal have a long and pleasant conversation and even receive blessings from the goddess. Eventually Tefiti creates a strong but gentle breeze to send Moana back home safely on her boat and then forms a jetstream in the sky to send Crystal back home safely. She is about to lay down to rest when she remembers something. She grinds you beneath her ass once more before leaning over and roughly scraping you off her ass with her finger. She brings you to her eye and glares at your pathetic form which looks like a very tiny booger plastered to her finger. You feel this is definitely not the last you will see of her as she grins mischievously sending shivers down your spine. She then aims in the general direction of pixie hollow and flicks you violently towards it!!! You are sent rocketing over the ocean at breakneck speed but where do you land!?
1111111111.title: Island sized Goddess Tefiti

choices: Head out (a heard of Centauress have entered pixie hollow)
Head out and scout the area
Stay home
11111111111.content:
Your poor plastered body was in complete agony and very sensitive to even the slightest touch. Much to your dismay her massive finger rammed into tour vulnerable form like a freight train! You saw the stars from the blinding pain of her flick and hurled through the sky like a very tiny comet.

Before you knew it pixie hollow came into view and you began to plummet into the forest! To your amazement, relief and horror all rolled together you smashes right into your home tree painfully smashing through the bark and splattering onto your own floor. While you now had a hole in your wall you were relieved to be in your safe hideout. Though it was very concerning that Tefiti knows the exact location you live in. Even the fairies don't know your exact location just the general area you live in.

Either way you can't do anything about it. In fact you literally can't do anything. Getting to horribly squashed and annihilated by such a collosal woman leaves you smashed for a week. Crystal and the rest of the fairy police force enjoyed the nicest, most peaceful seven days while you slowly recovered.

Now the week has passed and while you are still sore and very tender all over, you are at least back into shape and ready to leave your home. Will you head out to cause mischief?
11111111111.title: Speedy Delivery

choices: Fly to the police to see what's going on
Talk to a Centauress
Go somewhere else this smells like trouble
111111111111.content:
You stretch and do some lite exercise, hearing lots of pops and cracks along your spine and joints as things snap back into shape. You still feel tender but screw it you need a new adventure to put all this behind you.

As you fly below the canopy you notice many centaurs trekking through the forest. The bottom of their body is like that of a horse, four powerful legs and long flowy tails and the top half is a gorgeous woman. There are dainty ones, some with a zebra type body and then much taller and powerful Amazonian looking ones. They come in many colors, usually their hair color and horse body match. There are even more exotic looking colors like blue, purple and pinkish red ones among the herd.
111111111111.title: Centauress Herd

choices: Crystal Saw what happened
Nobody Saw what happened
The blue centauress knew you were there
1111111111111.content:
You decide that the best course of action would be to head to the police station to see what is going on. You of course don't want to interact with them but think you know a pretty good spot to spy on them. The closer you get to the police tree HQ the more Centauress you see.

You start to fly down hovering right against the bark of a neighboring tree and spot Crystal just outside the police station talking to a blonde Centauress with a pink horse body. You hear the Centauress say "Over a week ago our homeland was plagued by a curse that crept onto our shores and rotted our plains and forests. We've been searching as nomads for help!" Crystal gasps "That's awful! Now I'm not certain but I may be able to help you with this. I have a feeling in my gut" She says obviously thinking this is your fault.

You get a sinking feeling and think this must be more consequences from when you stole Tefiti's heart. You then notice Crystal look suddenly in your direction as some movement catches her eyes. You suddenly feel the warmth emanating from something beside you and look to see a gigantic blue horse butt about to ram into you. It all happened so fast that you stood no chance of escaping as a very fit, blue haired Centauress roughly slams her rear end against the tree and shifts her firm muscular ass cheeks against the rough bark of the tree to relieve a minor itch. She sighs with relief while in the meantime you are painfully crushed between her tough ass and the unrelenting bark getting squashed and ground flat as her butt cheeks take turns bulldozing your puny body.
1111111111111.title: Pressed for Information

choices: Onto the floor but safe
Another Centauress booty
Into the path of an incoming herd
11111111111111.content:
As you continue getting squashed like a bug by the unrelenting ass Crystal had noticed the sudden movement and saw the moment you got squashed behind the blue beauty. She struggled not to laugh as she returned her attention to the blonde Centauress.

When she finished her conversation she politely flew over to the blue one and said "Pleasure to meet you miss I am officer Cystal, Captain of the Fairy Police and am taking on this case to help your herd restore your homeland!" The blue Centauress's eyes light up with excitement as she says "Hi my name is Vale, and really you will!? Oh thank you thank you! You really think you can help us officer?" Cystal smiles and says "Yes I have a good feeling I can, or at the very least figure out the cause but I will need the assistance of the fairy behind your rump." Vale looks confused "behind my rump?" she asks before separating her ass from the tree.

Your painful and dark world suddenly fills with light and the massive pressure is relieved from your body as the giant blue ass leaves you squashed flat to the bark of the true and your view is then filled with Vale's beautiful light blue face. "Oh my I am so sorry little one I didn't see you there I hope you will be alright!" She says with a look of genuine concern as she apologizes. Crystal flies up to you and begins to grab your hair roughly and pulling with all her might to slowly peel you off the tree while saying "Trust me Vale this fairy is quite the trouble maker and I'm sure he deserved it" She winks and giggles at Vale but the Centauress still looks concerned.

Crystal plants her feet on the bark on either side of you and pulls with all her might ripping you off the tree but she looses her grip on you sending you flying towards...
11111111111111.title: Spotted by the Law

choices: Crystal flies up carrying you
Crystal flies up and leaves you on the floor
Vale approaches you
111111111111111.content:
You land roughly on the ground in a painful heap with the world seemingly spinning and trembling around you. As your vision comes to focus you see an alarming amount of hooves surrounding you. Then standing above you, Crystal looks down with a smirk on her face. You are relieved to see her as she did just help you out but are also terrified about what she might say. She sighs, you gulp with dread and the Centauress herd listens intently.

Crystal begins "Alright do you know anything about this?" Immediately you reply"No! I swear I have never even been to their lands!" Crystal continues "Yeah but I think we both know this could be connected to the Heart of Tefiti" You gulp again and nod. Meanwhile the Centauress start to speak among themselves. "But we returned the heart it can't be that right?" you say hoping this isn't in fact your fault. "It takes time to undo the damage Alf. Besides it happened right after you stole the Heart"

The herd starts to get agitated, many frustrated hooves start stomping the ground as you hear the voices in the heard all around you saying "This is his doing?", "He must undo this!!", "He needs to be PUNISHED" The angry booms of their hooves gets closer and closer!
111111111111111.title: Surrounded and Interrogated

choices: Crystal Prays to Tefiti for a sign
You try to escape
You and Crystal start to explore the wasteland for clues
1111111111111111.content:
As the herd closes in you feel Crystal grab your hair again as she darts up into the air carrying your flattened form like a towel over her shoulder. "Now just a second ladies!! I know it looks bad but we don't know for sure if he is guilty! WE will BOTH go with you to your lands and try to figure this out. Trust me if it is his fault he will pay VERY DEARLY" she says as she spits those words boldly at you. The herd is still agitated but calms down a bit. You even notice Vale's face in the crowd looking up and giving you a quick glare before looking away with her eyes closed and a "humph" escaping her lips, no longer feeling sorry that she squashed you unwittingly.

The herd then gets into formation and begins to trek back to their lands, leading the way as Crystal flies above them. "Please don't drop me!" You beg her. She smiles and holds you a little tighter saying "I probably should cause this is most likely your fault. but I won't"

You blush a little a get warm fuzzy feeling deep inside at her genuine protection of you. "You are so screwed if I can 100% prove it was you though" the warm fuzzy feeling is now replaced with despair and fear again...

It takes quite some time to reach their lands and by then you recover and fly alongside Crystal. It is a heartbreaking view as you see their dead forest and barren plains stretching off until it reaches a sandy beach.
1111111111111111.title: Innocent Until Proven Guilty

choices: Crystal wacks you
Crystal ignores you
11111111111111111.content:
The Centauress Herd look sadly upon their lands as you and Crystal try to figure this mess out. "I have an idea come with me" Crystal says as she grabs your arm and flies to the beach with the herd following closely behind. "When I helped Tefiti she blessed me with a strong connection to her, I believe I can ask her for help or at the very least a sign to help us." The herd whispers excitedly with hope in their voices.

Crystal stands along the water's edge looking in the direction of the Goddess's island and kneels down. She smacks you hard in the ass making you fall to your knees as well as leaving a stinging red mark. "Oh great Tefiti is this the fault of Alf the thief fairy who stole your heart?" You wince as she just puts you out there like that. One green flash of light shines in the distance for a moment signaling "Yes" You quickly stammer "That could just be a coincidence!" Then two green flashes shine out signaling "No". You bow your head down in shame "awww crap..." The herd gets audibly agitated again. Then two orbs of light shoot out from across the sea zooming in on you and Crystal!!

The both of you are zapped and start glowing green! You feel something happen to your wings and they lose their usual dim gold glow and shine bright green instead. You even notice your pixie dust has changed color and a few specs hit the ground growing very small blades of grass. Crystal on the other has her entire body turn light green and she begins to grow in size and even transform! She becomes a mighty Centauress herself with gorgeous flowing hair that seem like vines, even growing beautiful flowers along her head and her flowing tail. Her hooves shine a dull emerald color and gorgeous bush grass sprout beneath her feet and as her tail drags along the ground. The herd gasps in amazement from Crystal's transformation!

You on the other fly up behind her in frustration "What!? You get transformed into a Centaur Goddess or something and I just get green wings talk about double standard..."
11111111111111111.title: A Blessing and a Curse

choices: You get kicked towards Crystal
You get kicked accidentally and sent a far distance
They continue trampling you among the heard
111111111111111111.content:
Crystal rolls her eyes at your comment and whips you out of the air with her tail. You get smacked right out of the sky and right into the dry dirt, and the impact releases a decent poof of your green pixie dust upon impact and sprout a small bit of grass as the flecks hit the ground. Crystal laughs as she looks over her shoulder.

Vale on the other hand approaches you with excitement "That's how he can help us! I thought he would be useless" she said before rearing up on her hind legs and then SLAMMING down hard with her front hooves!! Her unrelenting feet are hard as stone and instantly smash you flat into the dirt releasing poofs of pixie dust with each STOMP of her feet. She then kicks you back to her hind legs and happily dances on you beneath those hooves as well relentlessly bringing them down upon you like anvils and smiling as her stomping sprouts more and more grass.

She then happily kicks you with her back legs to another Centauress in the herd who gracefully tramples you beneath her brutal strength and weight until she is satisfied with the grass your battered body produced before kicking you to another spot and Centauress all to eager to STOMP the living daylights out of you and the cycle goes on and on.

Meanwhile Crystal winces thinking that has got to hurt but then smiles knowing this is exactly what you deserve. She slowly approaches the herd and each step she takes burst with a beautiful lush patch of grass and flowers that put yours to shame. "I think the best course of action will be to walk the lands, it will take time but we can do this!" The herd all too happily agrees while you soul shatters with horror at what you just heard between deafening STOMPS!
111111111111111111.title: No Pain no Gain

choices: Crystal kicks you to the forrest
An interruption happens
1111111111111111111.content:
A stray kick scrapes your body from the dirt and shoots you into the ground right in front of Crystals majestic form. She can't help but giggle a little as your poor body twitches and you squeak "Mercy?" She feigns being sorry and shrugs her shoulders as if saying there's nothing she can do. She lifts her glowing hoof menacingly above her and you're certain you catch a smile creep onto her lips before she STOMPS down onto you. A loud BOOM and explosion of green ripples along the ground with a shock wave and Crystal feels an extra satisfying burst of power the instant your body is annihilated beneath her.

The impact created a breathtaking circle of plants and flowers that was much larger than any of the spots the herd produced. "I guess we need to combine our powers to help!" She says excitedly as she figured out the problem. The herd Cheers her on and you hear "She really can save us!!" You don't even get a little credit though that is the least of your problems right now as Crystal start to do a little jig happily dancing and STOMPING you beneath each of her hooves causing gorgeous bursts of vegetation to fill the area! She then gives you a mighty kick sending you soaring over the herd who happily give chase!

You land in a new barren patch of land and within seconds the thunderous quake of hooves is upon you as the herd joyfully stampede onto your battered and broken form!! You get trampled under countless merciless hooves that rain down endlessly like meteors breaking your body down to flatten every atom you are made of yet you keep supplying a seemingly endless supply of green dust. You even get stuck to a hoof for several steps before getting left behind again and kicked towards Crystal! She eagerly TRAMPLES you beneath her QUAKING magic before kicking you away and leaping high in the air and landing on you with such precision Causing an extra large burst of grass to cover the once barren plains. "Where should we take him next" she asks excitedly while walking in place keeping you hammered beneath her stomping feet.

"The sacred forest!" The herd exclaims!
1111111111111111111.title: Powers Combined

choices: You and Crystal return to Pixie hollow (reserved)
You and Crystal remain with the Centauress Herd for a while
Reader's Choice
11111111111111111111.content:
Crystal nods and steps off you examining you poor plastered body that can't even twitch anymore. "Isn't this great!? We really can make a big difference in this world" You give her a worried look and your eyes beg for mercy but she is blinded by optimism and feeling so good doing the right thing that she doesn't even notice. Instead she reaches down to peel you off the floor with ease and tosses you over her shoulder before kicking the shit out of you with all her might with her powerful back legs!

The impact sounds like a crack of thunder as her hoof shoots you across the fields like a cannon, raining magical dust as you 'fly' through the air. You land with a horrible CRACK as you crash back first against a tree. The impact causes some leaves to regenerate on the barren branches. Within a few minutes the herd arrives before you just as you peel from the tree and start to float down like a leaf. a Brown skinned beauty with long curly black hair and a zebra stripped body sees you coming down and gently elbows her friend, a light tanned amazonian Centauress with golden hair and a giraffe like pattern on her large firm body, getting her to look up at you. The two smile and stand facing away from each other giggling as you drift down right between their asses!

They quickly SLAM their butts together with a loud SLAP and grind you between their strong ass cheeks as green dust comically drifts down from between them like a pepper grinder. They separate leaving you stuck to the zebra booty before SLAMMING back together and repeating this time leaving you stuck to the giraffe pattern ass and SLAM SLAM SLAM as the women laugh at your predicament.

As Crystal approaches she giggles and says "Try slamming him into the tree" They nod in unison and your current captor, zebra girl, SLAMS her thick booty against the tree and lo and behold leaves sprout among the branches! though not many. She scrapes you off her ass and onto the bark as Crystal approaches. The herd watches in awe quietly as she turns around presenting her big green ass to you.
