A few moments later, you flew back out again, snickering to yourself. When the old loon fired up his wood chopper, he'd get quite the surprise. You flew to the top of the house's weathervane, surveying the village, wondering what you should do next.
131.title: Little Town, It's a Quiet Village...

choices: Better safe than sorry!
Nah, here's good
They've already seen you (Uh-Oh!)
1313.content:
As you watched the sleepy little town come to life, with all the hustle and bustle that humans seemed to love, you felt the sudden urge to mess with this whole routine. after weighing a few options, you decided on the market's water pump. If what you remembered about hydraulic principles from what that leggy blonde tinker fairy had been babbling to you about was correct, it wouldn't take much to increase the water pressure, hopefully to a comedic enough degree for your admittedly-low standards.

However, you had to admit to yourself, you had been more focused on chatting her up than listening to a lecture.

As you descended onto the pump's mechanism, you were relieved to see that the market was only just coming to life, giving you ample time to make the necessary adjustments. So engrossed were you in your work, you failed to notice the approach of the pump's first customers.

As you finished your sabotage, backing away to admire your handywork, you could hear several voices much closer than you were expecting, followed by a shadow eclipsing your position. quickly flitting from the base of the pump to the handle, you narrowly dodged a descending hand, and had a chance to see your first victims: a trio of blondes, similar enough to be sisters, carrying pails and squabbling with each other.

In spite of their awe-inspiring size, you had to admit they were rather pretty, and you suspected that they would make a very amusing cacophany when the pump acted up. But first, you should probably find a new vantage point, right?
1313.title: Mess with one of the town's water pumps

choices: "I'm so sorry..."
"Watch where you're flying, shorty!"
"Just what i was looking for."
133.content:
As you zip around the trees, you fail to spot the tall figure standing in your way. You notice the figure too late and you smack your body into it. You quickly dislodge yourself and after taking a moment to collect yourself you take a look at whatever was standing in your way.

It was a human woman, she wore a green tunic that had a hood that covered her head and a scarf covering her mouth, but you could clearly make out her gorgeous blue eyes that were staring into you. You had quite a bit of run ins with some "mischievous" humans over the years, you knew a rogue or a thief when you saw one, and this lady fit all the characteristics. Before you had the time to properly introduce yourself to a fellow miscreant, the human woman says:
133.title: You bump into a human

choices: Chase after her and convince her to leave.
Steal from her pouch
Leave her alone and resume going the human village
1332.content:
The woman frowned and said:"Hey! Watch where your flying shorty!". Angered by the human's rudeness, you fly up to her face and say: "You're the one that got in my way! Besides, what are you doing here? You know this forest is off limits right?". "It's none of your business, pipsqueak!" the woman responds as she moves her hand towards you and flicks you away with her finger.

You spin in the air for a while before you finally stabilize yourself. After you recover, you realize that the woman is no longer here. When you look around you realize that she simply resumed walking deeper into the forest. As she walks away you notice a small brown pouch tied to her belt. By the way the pouch was bouncing off her butt as she walked, you concluded that it was filled with either coins, gems or something even more valuable. After considering your options you...
1332.title: "Watch where you're flying, shorty!"

choices: Stomped you into the ground.
Shoves you in her boot.
13321.content:
You know what? She can't just wander into the forest whenever she wants. Sure, you weren't an upstanding fairy, but you were a fairy none the less and it was your job to keep the forest safe. You start flying after her, but you struggle to keep up with her as she expertly moves around the trees and bushes. From this you could assume that she had walked this path before, she was also very agile and mobile for a human, making it even harder to catch up. Eventually as you start tiring out, you get close enough to her and yell: "Hey! Stop right there!".

The girl lets out an annoyed sigh, she then stopped dead in her tracks. You're caught off guard by her sudden stop, and you are unable to slow down in time. So you smack into the woman for a second time, this time plastering yourself slightly. Having felt you hit her, the woman reaches back and grabs you by the leg. She quickly and painfully peels you off and dangles you by your leg in front of her face. Her blue eyes conveyed a mix of annoyance and anger.

"I already told you that this is none of your business. So leave me alone!" the woman says. "It kinda is my business, because if you haven't noticed, i'm a fairy and we're the guardians of this forest. So i'm not leaving you alone until you tell me what you're doing here." you say back. "Is that so? Well then, seems like i have to teach you a lesson in humility." the woman says. You gulp down realizing your mistake. You were at her complete mercy as she dangled you upside down, she then...
13321.title: Chase after her and convince her to leave.

choices: Reached her destination
She is confronted by something
133211.content:
Without any warning, the woman lifted you up into the air and then threw you towards the ground. You painfully collide with the ground, sending out a small puff of fairy dust. Your whole body ached as you slowly tried to get up while rubbing your head. You freeze in place once you notice a large shadow looming over you. Before you had the chance to flee or beg, the girl brings her foot down on to you at the speed of sound.

SPLAT!

Your body was painfully flattened between the cold hard ground and the human woman's boot. "You just can't take a hint can you? Well this ought to teach you not to stick your nose where it doesn't belong." She then started twisting her boot, further increasing your pain. You could hear her giggling softly as she painfully stretched and crushed your tiny body. After what seemed like a few hours, the woman finally stopped. Satisfied with the punishment she inflicted on you, the woman simply continues on her path, paying you no further mind.

Much to your dismay, you were firmly plastered onto the sole of her boot. When she started taking the first step, you were ecstatic to have her great pressure off you, you take a deep breath of clean fresh air. But your joy is short lived as she places her foot down, instantly knocking all the wind out of your lungs, and spreading pain through your body once more. This cycle of relief and pain continued for what seems like hours, as your oblivious tormentor strolled through the forest. Finally, she...
133211.title: Stomped you into the ground.

choices: Try to escape
Try and find their treasury
1332111.content:
After a few agonizing hours, the woman finally stopped in front of a tree. You couldn't see what she was doing as you were being squashed below her boot, but you could hear her doing a complicated sequence of knocks on the tree. You then heard a faint creaking noise, the woman then stepped forward where the tree used to be. The grassy forest ground was replaced by cold wooden boards as your captor started navigating some sort of secret hideout. The place was very busy from the sound of it, you could hear lots of voices in the background but you couldn't quite make out what they were saying.

You then hear the voice of a much older woman "It's good to see you Gwen, did your mission go well?". The woman whose's shoe you were stuck to(Gwen apparently) answered back:"Of course Samantha, I've got the gems in this sack right here". "You're sure no one followed you?" Samantha asked. "Don't worry, no one saw me come here. Well, except this one stupid fairy... But i made sure he wouldn't snitch." Gwen answers. "Very well, you may return to your chamber to rest up." Samantha said. "That's what i was planning to do." Gwen said, she then started walking again.

After a short walk, Gwen entered her room and sat on a chair. She then lifted her boots up on her desk, you took a sigh of relief as the pressure was finally lifted from your body. You stretch out your arms and you started pushing against her shoe with all your might, but you barely budged as after several hours your body was basically glued to the sole of her boot. It takes you 10 minutes to fully dislodge yourself, and another 10 minutes laying on her desk in order to recover. Luckily Gwen was too busy resting, she might have even fallen asleep, but you didn't bother checking as you immediately started thinking of a way out of this situation.

This place was most likely a hideout for thieves or assassins, and was likely filled to the brim with stolen treasures. On the walls of Gwen's room you see several banners that display a pile of coins with an open hand above them. This was the symbol of the forty thieves! An elusive guild of the forty most experienced thieves on the world. You've heard they have an underground hideout somewhere, but you would have never assumed that it was in your own forest. After carefully considering your options, you...
1332111.title: Reached her destination

choices: Play dumb and make up a lie
tell the truth
13321112.content:
The temptation of being able to steal some valuable from right under the nose of a guild of thieves was just too strong! After quickly stretching your limbs and wings, you silently fly through the open door. The entire hideout had countless rooms in it, all of which were well furnished, which is to be expected from a guild of thieves as powerful as the 40 thieves.

There were many more thieves in the hideout, and luckily you managed to sneak past them without alerting them. Interestingly enough, almost all of the thieves you saw were young women. After several minutes of navigating through the labyrinth hideout, you manage to find out where the treasury. You saw several thieves entering the room with treasure in hand, and then exiting empty handed. It had to be where they were keeping their stolen goods!

You manage to catch a glimpse of the insides of the room as one of the thieves was leaving it. It was filled with glistening gold and shiny gems, your eyes widen and you quickly fly towards it without a second thought. But before you managed sneak inside, you smash into something warm and firm, splattering yourself into it. Shortly afterwards you were brutally squeezed, and you realize that someone had caught you in their hand!

You look up and you see the angry face of an middle aged, short haired brunette. "What are you doing here?" she says in a familiar sounding voice, it was the woman you heard earlier: Samantha, the leader of the 40 thieves. You simply stared into her, too afraid to answer. She lets out a frustrated groan and she squeezes your body painfully. "Explain yourself immediately, fairy. What are you doing in our hideout?" she asks in a stern and commanding voice
13321112.title: Caught!

choices: Beg for her to let you leave
Convince her to let you join her guild of thieves
133211121.content:
In such a tense situation, your first instinct was to lie to her. "I... i got here by accident!" You manage to squeak out as the woman's iron grip squeezes your lungs. "I don't even know where i am... so if you could please show me the exit i would be very th-" you begin saying, only to be interrupted by another powerful squeeze.

The giant thief let out an annoyed sight and rolled her eyes. "You expect me to believe that, pipsqueak? I'm not letting you get away from here, you've seen too much, you can reveal our entire hideout" Samantha says as she begins walking through one of the hallways, with your tiny body in hand.

You gulp down, realizing how much you've messed up. "W-what happens now?" You stammer out looking at the giant thief's face.

"What happens now? We interrogate you and squeeze every ounce of information we can out of you. And afterwards we're either going to keep you here permanently or sell you on the black market for a profit" Samantha explains calmly. The word "interrogation" got stuck in your head. Just imagining the tortures they would force you to endure made your entire body shake with fear, but what shall you do in these dire circumstances?
133211121.title: Play dumb and make up a lie

choices: “We have a client that’s looking to buy a fairy.”
“I have another job for you.”
133212.content:
Dangling you by your leg still, the woman slides her right foot out of her boot and starts moving you toward the opening. “NONONONO, WAIT!!” You screamed, but it was too late. The woman presses your body against the center of the leather insole and squishes you into it with her thumb. Her boot smells like she’s been wearing it for ages, and the thick, cheesy air made it hard to breathe.

Without warning, the boot went dark. You see the woman’s giant foot enter the boot and panic, scrambling to reform and unstick yourself. Before you accomplish anything, the woman’s smooth sole crashed into you, squashing you painfully beneath it. The woman shifted all her weight to the foot you were under and rocked her foot side to side, stretching and squishing your tiny body further. You try to cry out in pain, but you’re too flat to make a sound, not that anyone could hear you anyway. As you thought it couldn’t get any worse, the thief starts running through the forest again, squashing you flatter with each agonizing step.

After an excruciating 20 minutes, you feel the thief’s pace slow down, giving you more time to breathe between steps. The woman pauses a few times, smothering you beneath her sweaty sole for minutes at a time. It was unbearable. Thankfully, she sits down after a while and crosses her legs, alleviating most of the pressure on you.

The thief sits in a tavern with a mysterious woman in a hooded robe. “Do you have it?” She asks the thief. “Of course I do. I wouldn’t be much of a thief if I didn’t.” Reaching into a pouch on her belt, the thief pulled out a ring with a huge green gemstone embedded in it as handed it to the woman discretely. As the woman inspected the ring, she says “Good job. Our client will be pleased.” The woman hands the thief a bag of gold. “Always a pleasure.” The thief says as she stands up, ending the fairy’s small break from being flattened.

“One more thing...” the woman says, catching the thief’s attention. She sits back down, a bit annoyed. What does the woman say?”
133212.title: Shoves you in her boot.

choices: The Thief ambushed him.
Alf caught sight of the Thief.
The gem was magical and did something.
Something else.
13322.content:
Alf was worried this human could be plotting something involving the fairy village. He wanted to distract her and he had just the idea. He noticed the satchel around her waist and darted over to it squirming inside. The thief stopped in her tracks as she heard the Alf riffling around.

“Hey you, Stop that.” She cried looking toward her satchel. Before she could react, Alf emerged with a large sparkling jewel. The mischievous fey flew off with the ill-gotten prize.

“THAT’S MINE YOU LITTLE SHIT!” The rogue cried which made Alf holler back at the thief “You want it come and get it.”

Alf flew as fast as he could through the forest trying to steer the woman further away from the village. This crazy plan of his was dangerous, if that thief catches him who knows what she would do. After a while Alf appeared to lost the rogue and decided to rest for a moment.

The exhausted sprite started to relax when.
13322.title: Steal from her pouch

choices: Stick the fairy in her mouth.
Shove the fairy down the front of her pants.
Stuff the fairy in her bodice.
Shove the fairy down the back of her pants.
Something Else.
133221.content:
A sudden rustling from behind alerted the fairy. Before Alf could turn around a feminine hand wrapped around his body. Alf grunted as he was brought in front of the thief’s smirking face.

“Well, well look what I caught.” The thief said snatching back the gem with her other hand. “Hey, let me go. It was just a little fun, honest.” Alf barked as he squirming in her grasp, the amused rogue just sneered at her little prisoner. “Oh, I have no doubt, I know all about you annoying little fucks.” The rogue said mockingly in a tone like one would use when talking to a stupid child.

“Always playing games and pulling pranks.” She said sarcastically with a smile and a chipper tone.

“But I am not the kind of person you fuck with.” She said with a growl, glaring at the fairy, which elicited a nervous gulp from Alf

“Now my little captive, how am I going to punish you.” She mused as she started squeezing Alf, making the fairy groan in pain.
133221.title: The Thief ambushed him.

choices: Alf would talk to her to distract her.
Alf would dive down her throat, since she can’t digest him.
Alf jumps out of her mouth and launches his plan.
Something else.
1332211.content:
“How about a little saliva bath.” The thief said with a maniacal smile as she opened her mouth. “No wait, you can’t do this, I’ll use my fairy magic and make you pay.” Alf cried futilely as he was stuffed into the woman’s mouth.

As the thief slurped down Alf he was instantly drenched in slobber. He squirmed in her mouth as she shoved him around with her tongue. She would push him against the roof of her mouth, or roll him around, occasionally crushing the fairy with her teeth in a mostly harmless way.

“Having fun in there, little guy?” She asked playfully. Alf popped out of her mouth and struggled to squeeze out. The thief quickly pushed him back in with her finger.

Trapped inside Alf continued to be accosted by the offending orifice. The tongue was as big as he was, it was like wrestling a mattress. Alf thought of his options, he could use magic but with such little room and the tongue’s constant assaults he couldn’t concentrate. If he somehow escaped, he would still be at her mercy as he couldn’t fly with his slobbery wings. He needed a moment to recover.

Then he had an idea.
1332211.title: Stick the fairy in her mouth.

choices: Her target a manor in the woods.
A den of thieves on the edge of the woods.
The fairy village! Alf’s fears realized.
Something else.
13322112.content:
Thinking quickly Alf turned around and slid down the thief’s throat. The thief was helpless to stop herself as her little prisoner plummeted down into her stomach. The involuntary reaction caught the thief by surprised, her eyes darted to her stomach, her hand flew to her middle as she felt the mass settle in her gut. “Uh oh.”

“Are you okay, Little guy?” She asked worriedly, giving her stomach a poke. “Fuck, I didn’t want to kill him.” She said sorrowfully, unknown to her Alf was perfectly fine but completely drenched.

Alf regained his composure and set about cleaning himself up with magic. With the flick of his wrist the saliva disappeared leaving the fairy clean and alone in the thief’s stomach. It was a little warm, like a sauna, it was kind of comfy. The stomach acids while harmless to him still tingled in a not unpleasant way. He kicked back and got comfortable. “Fuck, I didn’t want to kill him.” He heard the thief say from outside her voice muffled by her body.

Alf smiled in amusement, she was concerned about him, perhaps she wasn’t so bad. However, Alf was determined to make her reconsider her mercy. Alf snickered mischievously as he thought of all the ways he could mess with her and the best part was she couldn’t hurt him because he was inside her. He conjured a portal to spy on the thief’s activities and caused her stomach acid to bubble turning his sauna into a fantastical jacuzzi.

As the thief continued to her destination, her stomach started to bother her. It seems her stomach didn’t like her fairy meal, as she felt kind of gassy and frequently had to stifle some burps.

She had finally reached her destination.
13322112.title: Alf would dive down her throat, since she canâ€...

choices: Gwen retires for the evening.
Gwen had another client visit.
Something else.
133221122.content:
By the side of a road that cut through the woods there was a tavern, one with a reputation. Gwendolyn the thief walked up to the building and stepped inside. Her entrance caught the attention of a few patrons, rugged eyes leering at her. She scanned the numerous vagabonds looking for someone in particular.

She spotted him and took a seat next to him at the bar. As the barkeep came over to her, she glanced at him a said. “Give me an ale.”

“Do you have it?” The man next to her asked with his gravelly voice. She glared at him and growled. “Who do you think I am.” She took out the gem and slid it onto the counter. In response the man slid over a satchel filled with coins and took the gem.

He pocketed it away, took a swig of his flagon and said. “couldn’t have been easy.” The barkeep brought Gwen her ale which she accepted. “It wasn’t but nothing I couldn’t handle.” She said taking a swig.

Inside the thief the fairy watched their exchange with great interest, it was very intriguing, very cloak and dagger. Noticing her taking a drink the fairy thought quickly and used his magic to get a taste of the incoming ale. He drank his fill and enjoyed the show even more.

“Pleasure doing business with you Gwendolyn.” She took a swig of her ale and replied. “The pleasure was all UUURRRRPPP!!!” A sudden unexpected belch erupted from the thief’s mouth interrupting her and making her blush furiously. All around the tavern could be heard laughs, cheers, chuckles and even a few words of praise. The client bowed out from the embarrassing event and Gwen returned to her drink, trying to ignore the uproar her outburst caused.

“You okay Gwen?” The barkeep asked with concern. “I’m fine Dorrin, just something I ate.” She said dismissively as she took another swig. “Thanks for the tip.” She said tossing him a few coins. “Well you get the job done and people like that.” He said pocketing the money, Gwen got up from the counter and stretched. “my usual room.” She said tossing him a few more coins.

Gwendolyn headed for her room upstairs, ignoring the occasional amused patron pointing at her or giving her a thumbs up.
133221122.title: Gwendolyn the thief.

choices: Another fairy comes looking for Alf.
Alf awakens and starts plotting his mischief.
Another thief visits Gwen in the night.
Something else.
1332211221.content:
Gwendolyn removed her cloak and sat on the bed, her tanned skin glistened with sweat. Her looks were a little weathered from her rough life, but still quite fair, her eyes still lustrous. She was a thin and lithe woman, her muscles toned and supple. her body needed to be thin, given her line of work, better to slip into places unseen. The only problem in her eyes was she didn’t have a womanly figure, no real curves to speak of, not that she minded much.

Gwen’s hand drifted back to her middle rubbing it slowly, she still felt bloated from that damn fairy. She wished it would just go away, fairies aren’t poisonous are they, she admittedly didn’t know that much about the fey nor did she care to. They were an annoyance at best and she tried to avoid them, wanting to stay far away from their antics. Unfortunately for her, she now had one she couldn’t escape from spying on her life.

Luckily at this time he was too damn drunk to care about tormenting her, the little stow away using his magic to sift ale from the pool he was bathing in. Soon they both drifted off to sleep, A little while into their slumber something happened.
1332211221.title: Gwen retires for the evening.

choices: They wait until she wakes up.
They mess with her dreams.
Have Ysmina do something outside of Gwen.
Something else.
13322112211.content:
A little while before midnight Alf stirred from his slumber a voice calling for him. As sleep faded and his focus returned the voice called out to him, not through the air but loud and clear through his mind. “ALF!”

a light flittered before the window of Gwen’s room. It eventually phased through the glass and landed on the windowsill. It was another fairy with soft feminine features not like Alf’s. “Alf?” She cried not with her mouth but with her mind. She flittered over to the sleeping form of the thief, sensing Alf’s presence nearby.

“YSMINA!” exclaimed a surprised Alf, caught off guard by his friend’s visit. His voice was also being spoken with his mind not his mouth, leaving Ysmina confused as to his location. “What are you doing here?” He asked to the worried Ysmina who looked around the room for him.

“No one knew where you were and crystal feared you were devising some devilish plot and asked me to find you. Where are you?” Ysmina asked in exasperation, at which point a light shone from within the human so bright the figure of a fairy could plainly be seen even through her thick leather bodice.

The sudden smiling visage of Alf frightened the fairy and caused her to leap back in fear making a terrified eek, she quickly stopped herself fearing she might wake the human. “Alf is that you? What are you doing in there?” She cried telepathically as she looked at him in horror.

“Oh this, I saw this thief skulking in our woods and I was afraid she was seeking Pixie Hollow, so I distracted her and lead her away from the village” He explained his expression becoming more smug as his body language got more animated, Ysmina looked at him with mild interest her eyebrow cocked slightly. “That’s uncharacteristically thoughtful for you.” She said, Alf scratched his head in embarrassment as he explained further. “Yeah, I know but she didn’t really like my methods.” Ysmina’s eyes got huge as she jumped to the obvious conclusion. “So, she ate you!” Alf gave her a confused look before realizing what she said. “Oh no this was my doing I wanted a place she couldn’t reach me and this was the best place at the time.” He said with a nervous chuckle, Ysmina frowned at him disapprovingly. “Well the big lummox is asleep now, so phase out of her and let’s get out of here.” She said motioning for him to follow her. Alf crossed his arms defiantly and said. “Oh, I’m not going yet, I want to mess with her for a bit.” Ysmina rolled her eyes at her childish friend’s reaction. “Are you serious, fine I’ll tell everyone where you are.” She said with a sigh, turning to leave but Alf shouted out to her. “Wait! why don’t you hang out with me and watch the show, its actually quite cozy.” He said sheepishly. “The water’s fine.” He said lying back in the stomach acid.

Ysmina stared at him with utter apathy, she mulled over the idea and finally said with a defeated sigh. “Let me tell Officer Crystal.”

Around Midnight Ysmina returned and magically phased into the sleeping thief, finding the fairy waiting nervously, tenting his fingers. “So, what did Officer Crystal say?” She haughtily crossed her arms and said. “What you’d expect, this is foolish, and dangerous, and could destroy all of Pixie Hollow.” “But if it means she won’t have to deal with you for a while and helps prevent you from causing havoc in the village, she won’t intervene… yet.” She said accenting that last part by pointing at him.

Ysmina looked around at the slimy pulsing walls of the stomach. “Ugh, It’s disgusting in here.” She said with disgust shaking the acid from her hands. “Well you can do something about that right?” Alf said giving Ysmina a cheshire grin, she glared at him in annoyance. “Wait did you want me to stay so I could use my magic to turn this human’s guts into your own little palace.” She said with an angry sneer, Alf ignored her anger and replied with a smug smirk. “Well that’s not the only reason.” She gave him a curious look.

Into the night Ysmina worked many powerful magicks all for the purpose of turning the thief’s stomach into a comfortable lounge.

The first thing she did was use spatial manipulation to create a pocket dimension in Gwendolyn’s stomach, before it was quite cramped with both of them inside but with Ysmina’s power, she had turned the stomach into a spacious den. Outwardly there was no change to her stomach but inside was a space three times its previous size. It also would remain still even when the woman moves about and their voice and movements would barely be noticed.

Next, she conjured a few large magical pillows so they did not have to stew in Gwen’s stomach juices all the time.

Another thing she did to make their little venture more pleasant was she transformed Gwendolyn’s stomach acid into a sparkling and pristine pool of water that smelled strongly of strawberries.

With all these changes, Ysmina actually started to relax. She took out a few snacks she had brought with her and shared then with Alf. “So, what you got planned for her?” Ysmina asked munching away on a large berry. “Oh, that is where I need your help.” Alf said crunching some grains in his mouth.
13322112211.title: Ysmina the fairy friend.

choices: Alf gives her a really bad case of gas.
Alf gives her a magical case of bloating.
She doesn’t know magical beings are very fattening >:)
He transforms her some other way.
Something else.
133221122112.content:
“Dream weaving!” the surprised Ysmina said. “I’m not very good at that.” She said solemnly. Dream weaving was a simple ability for any fairy, but it relied heavily on one factor and that factor was imagination. As talented as she was in weaving magic, Ysmina was woefully unimaginative. Alf however was a veritable font of dreams and desires so he had no problem with it.

“Just do what I told you and make sure to say those things.” Alf said with a wink. He held her hand and they collapsed into the pillows, joining Gwendolyn in her slumber.

The thief Gwen was having a pleasant dream, in her dream she was relaxing in a red room, lounging on an elegant fainting chair. Slightly familiar man servants were bringing her platters filled with delectable treats. She ate them greedily and invited the servants to massage her feet and back. “This is the life.” She sighed, she had always desired a life of luxury, one where she could wallow in opulence. No life of hardships, no struggling to get by, just a simple life of leisure and decadence.

As she popped another treat in her mouth a quiet voice caught her attention. “You killed me.” An eerie voice moaned, Gwendolyn looked around for the source of the voice, when a feeling in her stomach caused her to look down. To her horror a tiny humanoid shape pushed out from her stomach and moaned louder. “YoU KiLled Me!” Her hands flew to her stomach in terror, a sudden rumbling caught her attention.

Gwen was suddenly lifted into the air by a giant hand, she looked around in a panic and saw the hand belonged to a massive fairy whose eyes glowed with a terrifying power. “You, you are the one who devoured my kin.” The giant form of Ysmina howled, her voice loud as rumbling thunder, Gwendolyn covered her ears it was so loud. “You mean that little fairy, I’m sorry, it was just a little prank.” Gwendolyn cried her face full of fear, roaring winds assaulted her forcing her to struggle to remain standing.

“It is an unforgivable crime to kill one of the fey folk an act punishable by death.” She growled glaring at the thief with her frightening visage. “You have taken the life of one of my kin you gluttonous beasts.” Gwendolyn was on the verge of tears, she closed her eyes and cried. “I swear he slipped down my throat, I didn’t mean to.”

“With my power, I curse thee, the world will know of your sin, your gluttony shall be for all to see, its weight will weigh heavily upon you.” Ysmina roared, with a slight smirk.

The frightened Gwendolyn put up her arms defensively as Ysmina dropped her into her mouth and let her plummet.

“FAIRIES!” Gwendolyn shouted, as she jerked up in a cold sweat. She looked around her empty room noting the sun had risen. “Blasted sprites.” She mumbled as she got up and began to start her day, shaking off the frightening dream.

As her sleepiness faded, she noticed she felt fantastic, she felt full of energy, and best of all the bloated feeling from before was gone. She even noticed with some bemusement, that she had the delightful taste of strawberries on her lips. As she was washing her face, she made another discovery. Her skin looked smoother, complexion was better, her hair looked glossier, the bags under her eyes were gone. She even thought that she looked a few years younger, she wasn’t old at all really, but it appeared that all the years of hardship had been undone. The only thing that brought her dismay was that her middle looked a little less toned, softer. “Are fairies fattening?” She mused poking her stomach and finding a new thin layer of softness. “Still, can’t argue with the results.” She said rubbing the smooth skin of her cheeks.

“How is this a punishment.” Ysmina asked watching the woman through the scrying portal. “Patience, she won’t enjoy it for long. We just need to wait for the right moment.” Ysmina slouched into her pillow, thoroughly unconvinced and glanced at Alf with a knowing look. “So, what are you really going to do to her.”
133221122112.title: They mess with her dreams.

choices: Gwen heads to the thieves’ guild.
Gwen looks for a contact.
Gwen journeys to another town.
Something else.
1332211221122.content:
After a bit more preening Gwendolyn donned her robe and was about the pull up her hood when she hesitated. She left it down, feeling a new desire to show off. She bounded down the stairs and warmly greeted the barkeep.

“Good morning Dorrin.” She said in a chipper tone, which “What’s gotten in to you today Gwen, since when do you leave your room before noon.” He said with a hearty chuckle as he poured her a drink, Gwendolyn was snatching pieces of cheese and biscuits for breakfast. “I just couldn’t help it! I feel so invigorated.” “Well that’s good cause Ivan was looking for you.” Dorrin explained giving her a drink, as she drank, he noticed the change in his old friend’s appearance.

“Hey Gwen, something looks different about you today.” He said stroking his chin as he looked her over. “Oh really, what ever do you mean.” She asked as she gazed alluringly at him and shot him an enticing smile. Her gaze making his cheeks blush slightly, eliciting a girlish giggle from her surprising them both.

She turned to leave but hesitated, noticing the pastries laid out for patrons. Without even thinking she popped two in her mouth, savoring the flavor for a moment before coming to her senses, wondering what compelled her to do that.

Inside the thief the fairies were helping themselves to her breakfast. Not interested in having pre-chewed food raining on their heads. Ysmina enchanted Gwendolyn’s throat. Now all food would be reformed, shrunken, and would appear conveniently on a plate between the two of them. She snatched the reformed pastries, and scoffed them down. “I love human food.” She moaned, as she savored the delectable treats.

Alf merely watched the scrying portal with intense interest at Gwendolyn’s journey.
1332211221122.title: Alf gives her a magical case of bloating.

choices: They Slip out to experience the debauchery.
They decide to stay put avoiding shenanigans.
They don’t slip out and use magic to make Gwen join the debauchery.
Something else.
13322112211221.content:
Gwendolyn left the tavern and travelled out of the forest back into the nearby city.

It was the city of Atmorah a fairly large shipping port that also had numerous traders and merchants. A city of commerce and prosperity and like all large cities a booming underworld.

Gwendolyn skillfully slipped between the industrious citizenry, darting down the streets with obvious familiarity.

She stopped by the occasional food stands, feeling compelled to snatch a few treats. It was strange she thought, she never really had a sweet tooth but for some reason couldn’t help herself from tasting a few cakes and pasties.

Inside Gwendolyn’s stomach Ysmina was having a great time satisfying her sweet tooth on the thief’s indulgence. “Oh my god this stuff is so delicious.” She cries, Alf gave her an annoyed look. “Are you going to make her eat every treat she sees?” He asked. “Hey if I’m going to be here, I’m going to get something out of it!” she countered her mouth full of éclair. With no better argument Alf merely shrugged in agreement.

Gwendolyn stopped on her route, something suddenly came to her attention. While she didn’t feel bloated like yesterday, her bodice did feel tighter than it felt earlier. Even though she had loosened it a bit just earlier today because of her stomach’s current puffiness. It still felt tight around her middle. She tugged on the strings at the bottom, to get a little more slack and rubbed her stomach in relief as she resumed her journey.

If she had paid more attention, she would’ve noticed that her stomach was no longer puffy, it was bloated, a small bump sticking out from her middle. Alf smiled deviously, waiting for the moment when she realizes what is happening.

She checked to see if anyone was following and ducked down an alley, she stepped up to the backdoor of a building and knocked a unique way. The little metal window on the door slide open. Eyes peered out from inside the window and looked around before glancing down.

“Gwen, that you.” Asked the doorman, Gwen glared at him and said. “What do you think Nick! Open up.” The eyes narrowed and Nick said. “Nuh Uh, Not without the password.” Gwen rolled her eyes and said with an annoyed sigh. “Ravens Soar.”

The eyes closed in amusement and Nick responded. “That a girl, rules are rules.”

The door opened and Nick welcomed her inside, she slipped past him and travelled down a flight of stairs.

At the bottom of the stairs, the fairies watching where greeted to the sight of countless vagabonds and rogues doing various illegal activities. It was like a carnival of criminal activities. Several nobles were gathered around in a circle smoking opium from hookahs. Gamblers gathered around tables placing bets and dealing cards. There was even a ring in the back where bloody boxing matches drew a large crowd of onlookers. The fairies were struggling to stay put at the sinful spectacles before them, perhaps they could slip out while Gwen is busy.
13322112211221.title: Gwen heads to the thieves’ guild.

choices: To the Englewood estate.
Before the job maybe some DEBAUCHERY.
Before the job she has some troubles in town.
Something else.
133221122112212.content:
A bloodied man being punched out right in front of Gwen’s face gave the two fairies pause. They decided it was a little too dangerous outside of their unknowing host and decided to stay put.

Gwen continued unfazed stepping over the beaten man and made her way toward the back where a man sat at a desk surrounded by opulent finery. As she reached the man’s desk, she sat heavily on the cushioned chair position in front of the desk and kicked up her feet on the nearby footstool. She noticed some candies in a bowl on his desk and snatched a few.

He glanced up from his paper work and leaned back in his seat. “Been a while Gwen, you don’t keep in touch and I see your making yourself at home as usual.” A hint of annoyance in his voice. Gwen lowered her hood and nonchalantly brushed her hair back. ‘Let’s not waste each other’s time Ivan, What’s the target.”

He huffed, took out a cigar and lit it. “It’s one we’re both real familiar with, a collection of priceless jewels has recently come into the possession of our “fried” the illustrious Lord Davenwood. As usual steal a few of the jewels in his collection and the senile old fool will be none the wiser, should be an easy job.” He said looking Gwendolyn over, his eyes drifting to the area under her bodice and finding an unusual bulge. “That is if you have been keeping up with your training.” Gwendolyn shot him a dirty look. “What’s that supposed to mean?” she snarled as she rose from the chair.

“Nothing, it doesn’t matter… I know you’ll get the job done, here’s your down payment.” He said, as he tossed her a satchel of gold. “You’re damn right about that.” She said taking the satchel, and heading toward the exit, oblivious to the fact her stomach was now sticking out more than an inch from her waist in an increasingly less subtle round curve.
133221122112212.title: They decide to stay put avoiding shenanigans.

choices: She completes the job with a few problems.
She completes the job but big problems occur.
She unthinkable can’t get the job done.
Something else
1332211221122121.content:
As the sun started to set Gwen approached the perimeter of the Davenwood estate. A high stone wall bordered the perimeter, atop it nasty iron spikes. Scaling the edifice was no easy task, luckily for her, she didn’t need to. A long time ago she used the money from one of her jobs to buy a vial of acid and used it on the drainage tunnel under the wall.

She corroded the bars in the tunnel to make a small hole, through which she could squeeze past. She assumed they never fixed it because the hole was so small, she was never very big. It had been a wise investment because Lord Davenwood had become a steady source of income for her. Every once and a while she would steal some of his treasure. He had so much and was so flippant about it he never caught on. He was the kind of person that bought things not to have them but to brag about having them. It infuriated her but his carelessness was to her benefit so she couldn’t be too mad.

She was just jealous, she just hated that she had to risk her life just to make do. While people like him could lay around all day, being waited on and growing fat and spoiled, how she secretly longed for that life.

She reached the tunnel and got down on the ground. She rolled onto her back and cloak as she had done many times before and slowly slid toward the bars. She carefully slipped under the half-broken bars, first one arm then the next, her barely existent chest easily slipping under after that. With her upper body through she grabbed on to the edge of the tunnel and pulled the rest of her through. Or at least tried to but was stopped by the bars digging into her stomach. She looked down in confusion and noticed her belly was sticking out obscenely. “What the… I’m more bloated than I thought.” She said quietly to herself. She frowned in disapproval before sucking in her gut, it was only then that she was able to pull herself entirely through.

She crawled out of the tunnel and stood up scurrying toward the estate before she was noticed. She crouched down at the entrance to the servants’ quarters. She carefully peeked through the door’s window to see if the coast was clear. When she saw no one was around, she picked the lock, and slipped quietly inside.

Once inside she looked around frantically, listening for the sound of footsteps. When she was sure she wasn’t in danger of being caught, she brushed herself off. As she brushed off her chest, she finally started to notice just how bloated she was. She ran her hands down her chest finding her stomach now stuck out further than her breasts. Not a hard task obviously but still a very dramatic change from before. She looked at her reflection in the door’s window and noticed she looked huge. Her stomach had swollen so much it had grown into a pot belly.

She looked like she was exiting the first trimester of pregnancy, around maybe four months. “What is this!?” She exclaimed poking the new gut, she looked worryingly at her swollen reflection. This was not good, and she new it had something to do with that fairy. She turned her attention back to the task at hand. She needed to complete this job and fast, she thought as she rubbed her stomach.
1332211221122121.title: To the Davenwood estate.

choices: She finds the tailor with little fuss.
She has trouble along the way.
Her search is interrupted by another adventure.
Something else.
13322112211221211.content:
Gwendolyn creeped quietly around the estate, her larger middle slowing her down slightly. She had noticed there were less servants around after her last few visits. It couldn’t be because he was running out of money, she figured he was just getting stingier and more paranoid in his old age. Where once he had dozens of servants around, he now only had a handful. It was almost sad, she mused but it made things easier for her.

She knew he had wings dedicated to his hoard of treasures and relics and she knew exactly where they were. She quickly and stealthily headed for the entrance hall and ascended the large staircase. At the top of the staircase she was about to head toward the west wing but the sound of footsteps gave her pause. Unable to reach a place to hide in time she leaped over the banister and hung from the second story. An act she instantly regretted as she found herself weighting noticeably more than she was used to.

The fairies watching the spectacle jumped for joy, amazed at Gwendolyn’s quick thinking. “Wow, she is good.” Ysmina said impressed by the thief’s athleticism, and at her size. “That’s not a good idea.” Alf said noticing how her expression was strained.

The familiar voice of Eldridge Davenwood came slowly into earshot. “Send word for Lord Valenfore to visit me soon, I want to hear about these exotic kingdoms he’s visited on his recent excursion, I want to know what sort of treasures they have.” The lord said with a child like glee. “Yes sir.” Replied the maid following him, they leisurely descended the staircase, at a painfully slow pace for the thief Gwen.

The fairies were on the edge of their cushions, Ysmina chewed on her nails, and Alf was pulling his ears down. Both of them nervously sweating as they watched the tense scene playing out before them. Lord and his maid exited the entrance hall completely unaware of Gwendolyn’s presence, much to the relief of the bloated thief and her fey viewers.

Her relief was short lived though as the task of getting back on the upper floor remained. She had to struggle twice as hard given her new expanded bulk. She pulled it off with an exorbitant amount of effort but when she did she was left exhausted and out of breath.

She uneasily continued her search when she reached the storage room. All of the lord’s treasures were stored in the storage room, until their future displays are finished being built. She looked around for the box that contained the gems in question. She found one that looked to be the appropriate size and took out her pry iron. She opened it and inside she found her prize, twenty beautiful sparkling gems each worth a pretty sizable sum. She obviously didn’t take them all but pocketed the three largest ones. She placed them in her pouch and secured it around her waist, with the goods secured she headed over to the high window in the back of the room. She clambered up with a little extra effort, and prepared to leave patting her bulging satchel filled with her pilfer jewels.

At least she would have if she hadn’t forgotten about the bars, these ones were wider than the ones in the drainage tunnel and she easily slip through them… before. She glanced down at her enlarged gut, it looked somehow even bigger and swelled out under her bodice. She groaned in frustration and carefully climbed back down.

She snuck out of the storage room and headed for the nearest guest room. She carefully entered the room making sure it was empty and headed for the window. She carefully creeped out onto the windowsill and sidled over looking for a place to secure her grapple. She found a good place to descend and secured her hook. She started rappelling down when she realized her grip was starting to give out. She had lifted her heavier body so much tonight that her grip started to slip. One little slip up and she went plummeting into the bushes below. She had descended enough so she wasn’t hurt, all except for her pride, she clumsily got out of the bushes, and released her grapple.

After all the troubles she had had tonight, Gwendolyn exhaustedly returned to the drainage tunnel and repeated the process before. Once again, she got caught on the iron bars and with a defeated sigh, sucked in her gut again. She tried pulling herself out again, only to feel the bars jabbing into her still. Gwen’s looked down immediately, her fear being confirmed. Even though she was sucking in her gut, it still stuck out so much her bodice got caught on the bars.

This was impossible she had just fit through a few hours ago, she thought to herself. “What is happening to me?” She whispered in fear, her dread was interrupted as she felt the bars slowly digging deeper into her bulging middle. “No, no, no!” She cried in a panic trying to pull herself free, her legs flailing wildly. She braced herself on the ground and pulled herself through with all her might. She groaned in agony as a sudden loud tearing filled the air.

She pulled herself free and scrambled away from the tunnel having narrowly escaped being skewered. Gwendolyn’s heart was racing that was too close she thought, she looked down to see her bodice had been shredded. A tear ran down half of her favorite bodice and from that tear bulged a stomach that looked like it belonged to a woman heavy with child. She cradled it in disbelief, it was turgid and heavy, and felt like a giant wine skin.

She checked to see that her satchel was still secured and waddled away as fast as she could, having narrowly eked out a victory. As she travelled the city streets, she noticed her reflection in the store windows. She looked bizarre to say the least, she was still her usual toned and svelte self, everywhere except her stomach. It bulged out unnaturally, its size rivaling a woman who was five months pregnant and with a similar rounded firmness. This coupled with her non-existent chest and petite rear, shattered any illusion she was pregnant, that and her deep innie.

The bizarre state of her stomach almost distracted her from other changes that were happening. She noticed that her skin almost glowed it was so much lighter and so smooth. Her hair had grown voluminous and was so glossy it shone even in the dark. Her eyes sparkled with an inner light and her features had softened, even her lips had become slightly fuller. As she stared at her own face, she became entranced, it took her a moment to shake off the feeling and regain her composure.

She looked again noticing her ruined clothes, she took out the satchel of money she had earned from yesterday. She looked at her shining orb of a belly and decided she should do some late-night shopping.
13322112211221211.title: She completes the job with a few problems.

choices: Another dream or nightmare.
Another fairy or fairies visit.
The tailor had called the guards.
Something else.
133221122112212111.content:
She wandered the quiet streets like a phantasmal vision, her radiant supernatural beauty catching the attention of quiet a few late-night wanderers. Getting attention is the last thing a thief wants, so she donned her hood so as not to attract too much attention, her strange physique hidden under her cloak.

She saw a lady of the evening smoking at the curb, she decided to ask her about a tailor. She approached the lady who eyed her suspiciously. “Excuse me, might you know of any tailors in the area that would work late?” Gwen asked trying her best to sound courteous.

“No, I don’t and I don’t like creepy fucks loitering around my spot, so shove off before I call the guards.” The harlot barked taking a big hit on her pipe, and blowing her smoke at Gwendolyn.

She just rolled her eyes and reached into her pocket taking out a few silvers and tossing them at the surprised woman. She caught them and eagerly stowed them inside her bountiful cleavage. “Oh yeah, there is a place three streets down from here, take a left and you’ll find it for sure sister.” She said in a friendly tone taking another hit from her pipe.

“Thank you.” Gwen said taking her leave, heading for the location the harlot had talked about.

She stepped up to the store in question and knocked, it took a while for someone to respond. An elderly man opened the door and looked at her warily. “What’s this about?” He asked earnestly at the unexpected visitor, lowered her hood, her radiance leaving the man awed. She looked at him imploring and replied. “Good evening sir, you’re a tailor right, I had heard you were willing to work late, I have a bit of an emergency.” She said timidly, the gentlemen grimaced regretfully. “Look miss, it’s the middle of the night, I don’t really do that.” He excused as he started closing the door. Gwen lunged holding the door opened and replied. “Wait, I really need help and I have money.” She cried slamming her hand on a table by the door. When she recoiled her hand, she revealed a handful of gold and silver coins. The tailor looked at it with intense interest, he glanced back at her with a discerning and saw her nervous smile. “Alright, come on in.”

She bowed gratefully and walked inside. “So, what do you need miss.” He said as he closed the door.

“Well, I had an accident during a recent excursion and tore my clothes.” She said turning around and opening her cloak, revealing her disheveled appearance. The tailor was expectedly taken aback by her current state. “That’s an unusual choice of garb for someone with your unique physique.” The tailor said as he looked her over in bemused interest. Gwen grimaced in frustration, she knew what he was getting at, she must’ve looked like a whore that had gotten knocked up by a keg of ale, with her bulging stomach on full display.

“Come over here lass, let’s get you fitted.” He said heading toward his work space. She followed his lead and let the man do his work. “Why are you still wearing these things, aren’t they a little tight on you.” He asked noting how her bulk bulged out from between her pants and torn bodice. They weren’t this tight yesterday she snarled in her mind but replied calmly. “I never had the chance to get new clothes, I travel a lot doing mercenary work.” He looked at her quizzically. “You some kind of adventurer.” She averted her eyes and said with a droll tone. “Something like that.”

He kneeled behind her and said. “Now for the waist.” Gwendolyn blushed as he looped the tape measure around her inflated middle. “Oh boy.” He said with an amused chuckle, out of his view, Gwen rolled her eyes in annoyance, when suddenly she felt the tape measure tighten before being pushed away. “Huh, what the, I could’ve sworn.” She heard the confused tailor say, as he readjusted the tape. Gwendolyn knew what had just happened she had gotten another inch added to her waist. This was serious, how big was she going to get, she already looked pregnant, soon she’ll look due, will she continue to grow?

“All done, so what exactly are you looking for miss.” The tailor asked draping the tape measure over his shoulder. “Something similar to what I am currently wearing but with more coverage” she said placing her hands on her gut, the tailor nodded in agreement. “However, it must be very loose around the waist, and stretchy.” She added raising her finger, the tailor gave her a perplexed look and asked. “You thinking you’ll get bigger.” Gwen sighed and responded. “I fear I will.” She said with a solemn look, the tailor just shrugged and got to work.

“Make yourself at home, this’ll take a while.” The tailor said getting to work. As Gwen relaxed, she noticed she was starving. “I don’t mean to interrupt, but is there a place to get food.” The tailor scoffed and said. “No need miss, can’t let a customer go out there looking such a mess, help yourself to some of my stock, I have plenty.” Gwendolyn was a little surprised at the tailor’s generosity but gladly accepted in.

While the tailor worked, she helped herself to his food. She gathered up some cheese, sausages, bread, and more than a handful of sweets. As she consumed the small feast, she started to wonder. Why did she get so much to eat? She never was much of a big eater or consumed so many sweets as she had. Her stomach burbled happily as she stroked it, what sort of spell was she under.

As time worn on Gwen started feeling exhausted, her shoulders ached from that stunt with the banister, her back hurt from her growing weight, and even her feet were swollen. Soon her exhaustion overwhelmed her and she drifted off to sleep.

While she slept though.
133221122112212111.title: She finds the tailor with little fuss.

choices: She awakens a little bigger.
She awakens a lot bigger.
She has changed in a different way.
Something else.
1332211221122121111.content:
The two fairies sighed contently as they just finished sharing in Gwen’s little feast. “That was great.” Alf exclaimed. “I’m stuffed.” Ysmina purred as they both lied on the pillows. “Hey keep eating like this and you’ll look like her.” Alf said with a Cheshire grin. “You’d like that wouldn’t you.” She countered giving him a smug smirk. “Hey want to fool around.” Alf replied waggling his eyebrows. “Always.” Replied Ysmina.

It is no secret that fairies are known for a few things, playing mischievous pranks and courting anything that moves. As the two fey go at it inside the swollen thief a supernatural desire wells up inside her. She starts sweating and writhing as her body fills with the magical energy of the fairies’ passion. Her hand slips under her bulging gut and into her leather pants as her dreams fill with erotic fantasies.

Watching Gwen get so worked up through the portal Alf couldn’t help but be inspired. Alf looked at his fairy lover and said. “Hey let’s have a little fun like this, while we’re dream weaving this time.” Ysmina gave him an agreeable smile.

In Gwendolyn’s dream she was her old skinny self, lying on a large bed in the master bedroom of a palatial manor. A mysterious lover thrusting into her velvety folds with passionate enthusiasm. She moaned in ecstasy letting herself get swept away in the pleasure.

Her pleasurable experience is interrupted by a familiar booming voice. “Having fun are we.” Gwen looked at the source of the voice and saw the giant fairy from before getting similar treatment to her, next to her on the bed. Her eyes still glowed with an ominous light although she was now equal to Gwen in size but her stomach was swollen making her look pregnant.

“What are you doing here.” Gwendolyn panickily cried, as the frightening fairy smiled at her deviously. “Indulging like you.” She said stuffing a slice of cake into Gwen mouth. “This is what you dream of isn’t it, living in the lap of luxury, willing partners at your beckoned call, no cares, no hardships, living the easy life, like a spoiled pet.” Gwen blushed as she suddenly felt self-conscious about her compromising position. “Stop, no more.” She cried to her lover, he didn’t react and kept thrusting away. “But you know indulgence has side effects.” The fairy said, at that moment Gwen’s lover climaxed and she was rendered speechless. He unloaded into her and kept unloading. Gwen clenched her teeth as her lover came and came, like a fountain. Soon the onslaught of virility started to affect her body, her full womb swelling larger taking her belly with it.

Gwen lied there in bloated bliss to the amusement of Ysmina. “Good wasn’t it, but it’s not over.” Gwen’s lover started to go at it again, much to Gwendolyn’s horror. “Wait no, I said stop.” She cried futilely but her lover dig not listen, and even more terrifying with each thrust into her, Gwen stomach swelled larger soon attaining the size she currently possessed in the waking world.

“Please, I implore you! I know it is by your doing that my belly has swelled. I am sorry about your friend, but you can’t do this to me.” A particularly forceful thrust made her wince, Ysmina reached out and rested her hand on the thief’s head.

Gwendolyn gazed into her eyes and said with a groan. “I don’t deserve this. I can’t keep growing larger and larger.” Ysmina replied with a reassuring look. “Oh, it will stop eventually.” She explained, relief washed over Gwen’s face. “Yes, when your stomach is as large as a mountain.” Ysmina said with a manic smile as she laughed mockingly. Gwen closed her eyes as the pressure inside her mounted. With each thrust she would be pumped up, inflating bigger and bigger until her massive balloon of a belly dwarfed her.
.
“Why are you doing this to me.” She groaned out, the amused Ysmina replied. “It amuses us.” Gwen looked at her accusingly. “Us what do you mean us.” The intimidating demeanor of the fairy was dispelled as her face took on a worried expression. “Oops, never mind. Shouldn’t you be exploding now.” She said dismissively. Bigger and bigger Gwen grew still, an ominous creaking sound filled the air, Gwendolyn groaned in pain until finally, POP.
1332211221122121111.title: Another dream or nightmare.

choices: Go get something to eat.
Head back to the guild.
She is interrupted by more shenanigans.
Something else.
13322112211221211111.content:
Gwendolyn once again jerked awake after another night of fairies haunting her. She lied back with a frustrated groan she was sick of these nightmares. She recalled the events and remember the fairies little slip up. Us huh, she thought, perhaps the reason and demise of that little fairy was greatly exaggerated.

She got out of the chair she had fallen asleep in and stretched. She noticed the sun shining in through the window and looking down she noticed she looked to have grown more through the night. She now had a belly that rivaled a woman six months gone and approaching seven. She had to deal with this curse as quickly as possible. If there was any truth to that fairy’s words, she had to stop this before she outgrew the city.

Curious if her new clothes were done, she headed back to the tailor’s workspace.


She found the tailor sitting at his counter sipping tea, he noticed her approaching and perked up. “Ah, good morning lass, did you sleep well.” She smiled weakly at him and said “Not so much.” He looked disappointingly at her and replied. “Sorry to hear that but the good news is I finished your outfit.” He exclaimed his excited expression beaming with pride, he rushed into the backroom saying all the while. “I don’t mean to brag milady but I kind of got swept up in the moment. I may have put a little more effort into this than I had intended.”

He came out carrying a bundle of dark clothes. “I had a feeling you would appreciate darker hues, good for night time travels.” He said with a wink, he handed her the bundle and pointed her to the changing room.

She entered the changing room and removed her gear, and caught a glimpse of herself in the mirror confirming her suspicious. She saw that she had indeed grown larger during the night. Her stomach would make her appear obviously pregnant if not for the lack of growth anywhere else.

Tired of looking at her weird body she focused back on her new outfit. First, she took out the pants, they were sturdy but didn’t impede her movement at all and as a bonus felt wonderful. They had buttons on the bottom of the pants legs to allow even more mobility and in the front of the crotch there was a button to hold in the elastic waistband. She undid the button and let her belly push out into the stretchy crotch. It was amazing and fit perfectly.

She then focused her attention to the top, It was a billowy black dress that reached to her mid thighs, at the chest area was a bodice that could be laced up like her older one. It also had a pair of short puffy sleeves on her shoulders with a hole that exposed her supple shoulders. It was a little fancier that her old outfit but she didn’t care too much. Once again as she slipped on the top, she noticed that even though she had grown it still fit fine.

The kind old tailor had even given her a new larger cloak and a stretchy woven belt. She slipped on the belt and attached her various satchels and weapons. Then finally slipped on the cloak and admired the whole ensemble.

She rushed back into the work space and gave the tailor an enthusiastic hug. “Thank you so much, I love it.” She cried giving the old man a kiss.

He smiled knowingly as she released him and said. “You know this isn’t the first time I saw a girl like you.” He said rubbing her belly gently. “Many years ago, when I was still an apprentice, a woman visited my mentor her belly swollen up like a prized pumpkin. You are mischievous Fairy named Alf. You have a nasty reputation among the other fairies as a thief and a trickster and usually find yourself being chased by the lead officer Crystal. She is one of the best looking fairies and tough so you usually find yourself bested by this pretty "police officer."
